product_name: National Book Network Ultralight Survival Kit
long_description: A pocket-sized guide with proven know-how for hikers, Ultralight Survival Kit draws on the experienced knowledge of author Justin Lichter to advise on all aspects of the outdoor experience.
short_description: A pocket-sized guide with proven know-how for hikers, Ultralight Survival Kit draws on the experienced knowledge of author Justin Lichter to advise on all aspects of the outdoor experience.
